CustomField.description: JSON object mapping data from the graph's state into the arguments for the primitive capability. Uses semantic references to access data from the initial input or previous nodes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: JSON object mapping this node's inputs to the graph state. Example: {"caseId": "{!input.case_id}", "accountId": "{!find_account.account_id}", "userId": "{!context.user_id}"}
CustomField.label: Input Mappings
